title: What is a Variable?
content: A variable is a container for storing data values in Python.

title: Data Types
content: Python has several built-in data types, such as int, float, str, and bool.

title: If Statements
content: If statements are used for conditional execution in Python.

title: Loops
content: Loops allow you to repeat a block of code multiple times.

title: Introduction to Arrays
content: Arrays are used to store multiple values in a single variable.

title: Lists in Python
content: Lists are dynamic arrays in Python.

title: Stacks
content: A stack is a LIFO data structure.

title: Queues
content: A queue is a FIFO data structure.
